title: U.S.-Trained Iraqi Army Failed To Stand Up To Insurgents
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to retired Lt. Col. John Nagl, an author of the U.S. Army/Marine Corps Counterinsurgency Field Manual, about U.S. military strategy and policy during and after the Iraq war.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
